directions.step:
APPROXIMATELY TEN (10) MINUTES PRIOR TO SERVING PERIOD FOOD SERVICE COOKS WILL PREPARE ONE HALF CASE OF WAFFLES BY PLACING IN A TOASTER OR ON A GRILL. WAFFLES WILL BE PROGRESSIVELY COOKED THROUGHOUT THE SERVING PERIOD. WHEN REPLENISHING WAFELS TAKEN INTO CONSIDERATION TO PREVENT FOOD WASTE. AFTER SERVING PERIOD IS OVER THAT MEAL. Recipe Number: S00114
SERVING SIZE: 2 EA
From the <Army Master Recipe Index File> (actually used today!). Downloaded from Glen's MM Recipe Archive, http://www.erols.com/hosey.
